_metadata.description: Temporary storage for Telegram Web App users. Will be migrated to database.

fields.current_balance: Current Murzikoyns balance (starts at 500 for new users)
fields.store_id: Which of 6 stores user registered from (CRITICAL for tracking)
fields.first_login_bonus_claimed: Boolean flag - true after 500 coins awarded
fields.registration_date: ISO 8601 timestamp when user first logged in
fields.chat_id: Telegram chat ID for bot messaging (equals telegram_user_id for private chats)

database_migration_notes.sql_schema: CREATE TABLE users (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, telegram_user_id BIGINT UNIQUE NOT NULL, first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(255), username VARCHAR(255), language_code VARCHAR(10), current_balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 500.00, store_id INT NOT NULL, first_login_bonus_claimed BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, registration_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, last_activity TIMESTAMP, chat_id BIGINT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (store_id) REFERENCES stores(id))
indexes: CREATE INDEX idx_registration_date ON users(registration_date DESC)
database_migration_notes.important: Store association tracking is CRITICAL - track which of 6 stores user came from for analytics and targeted campaigns
